Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Sarapamon:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/ n~te piaylovoroc m~marturoc: Abba Carapamwn pie~pickopoc. P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers of the struggle-bearer and martyr, Abba Sarapamon the Bishop, O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
